targets.expr: avg by (marker) ((rocm_utilization_percentage) * on (instance) group_left(jobid,marker) rmsjob_info{jobid="$jobid"} * on (jobid) group_left(marker) count by (jobid,marker) (rmsjob_annotations{jobid="$jobid"} > 0))
